code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import classes from'./MealItem.module.css';import MealItemForm from'./MealItemForm';import CartContext from'../../../Store/CartContext';import img1 from'../../../assests/cover.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MealItem=function MealItem(props){var cartCtx=useContext(CartContext);var price="price is: $".concat(props.price," ");var addToCartHandler=function addToCartHandler(amount){cartCtx.addItem({id:props.id,name:props.name,amount:amount,price:props.price});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:classes.meal,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.description,children:props.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.image,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:classes.img,src:img1,alt:"Meals images"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.price,children:price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealItemForm,{onAddToCart:addToCartHandler})})]},props.name);};export default MealItem;
